name: Registration Confirmation
description: Confirm your Registration to My Reels
content:
Thank you for signing up with MyReels.

To complete your registration for the account associated with {=email}, please use the following activation code:

ACTIVATION CODE: {=code}

To activate your account, please follow these steps:

1. Go to MyReels

2. Enter the activation code as your password.

3. Update your password on the web app.
